Flowchart Structure
Start → Trigger → Condition → Steps → End

1. Start

Oval: Start


2. Trigger

Rectangle: Event: pull_request.closed on branch test/PROD


3. Condition

Diamond:

PR merged?
Title starts with Sprint Release:?
Yes → Proceed
No → End




4. Steps


Rectangle (Step 1): Clone repository

Configure Git user
Checkout test/PROD



Rectangle (Step 2): Compute next sprint tag

Find last sprint_* tag
Increment number



Rectangle (Step 3): Collect commits

Filter merge commits into test/PROD
Format release notes in commits.txt



Rectangle (Step 4): Create and push new tag

Tag HEAD with new_tag
Push tag to GitHub



Rectangle (Step 5): Create GitHub release

Use GitHub API
Body = formatted commits




5. End

Oval: Release created successfully
